paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from a study on double heterozygosity in Chinese breast cancer patients.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In our Chinese cohort, we identified two BRCA DH cases; one of them carried c.5511G>C; p.(Trp1837Cys) in the BRCA1 gene and c.7471C>T; p.(Gln2491*) in the BRCA2 gene.

functional_data.summary: Functional impact not detailed in the paper.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was part of a double heterozygous case.
key_quotes: In our Chinese cohort, we identified two BRCA DH cases; one of them carried c.5511G>C; p.(Trp1837Cys) in the BRCA1 gene and c.7471C>T; p.(Gln2491*) in the BRCA2 gene.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: One Japanese DH proband had BRCA1: c.188T>A; p.(Leu63Ter) and BRCA2: c.5576_5579del; p.(Ile1859fs) mutations.

functional_data.summary: Functional impact not detailed in the paper.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was part of a double heterozygous case.
key_quotes: One Japanese DH proband had BRCA1: c.188T>A; p.(Leu63Ter) and BRCA2: c.5576_5579del; p.(Ile1859fs) mutations.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
